references: Related: Ord 78207, Ord 29567, Ord 78517, Ord 78820. Amending: Ord 77811
summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Emerson Street, from 15th Avenue West to West Emerson Place and certain other streets and avenues, by grading and paving the same; constructing viaducts, etc.; including in said improvement certain additional streets and work in lieu of portions omitted; appropriating additional funds therefor; authorizing the Port of Seattle to perform certain additional work as the agent of the City and amending Sections 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 and 7 of Ordinance No. 77811 as amended by Ordinance No. 78207.
